title: 6 Best New York Hotels for Pet Owners with Spas
excerpt: Finding a hotel that welcomes both your furry friend and offers luxurious spa amenities can be a daunting task in the bustling city of New York. This curated list not only highlights pet-friendly accommodations but also ensures you and your pet can indulge in relaxation and rejuvenation. Navigating the options has never been easier, making your trip more enjoyable for both you and your beloved companion.
intro: Discover the perfect blend of pet-friendly luxury and spa relaxation at these top New York hotels.

hotels.name: 1 Hotel Central Park
hotels.description: Discover unparalleled comfort at 1 Hotel Central Park, where each room features premium amenities like air conditioning and plush seating. Savor a delightful dining experience at Jams, the on-site restaurant known for its innovative dishes and inviting atmosphere. Perfectly situated in the heart of New York City, the hotel offers easy access to iconic attractions and exceptional services, including a fitness center and 24-hour front desk.
hotels.highlight: 1 Hotel Central Park offers pet-friendly accommodations with premium amenities and a convenient location near iconic attractions.

hotels.name: The Carlyle, A Rosewood Hotel
hotels.description: Experience ultimate relaxation at The Carlyle, A Rosewood Hotel, featuring a full-service spa that offers a variety of indulgent treatments. Delight your palate with gourmet dining at two exquisite restaurants and a charming caf√©, followed by a refreshing drink at the stylish bar. With a prime location in New York City, you are just steps away from iconic attractions like Central Park and the Metropolitan Museum of Art, making your stay both luxurious and convenient.
hotels.highlight: The Carlyle offers a full-service spa and gourmet dining, just steps from Central Park and the Metropolitan Museum of Art.

hotels.name: The Mercer
hotels.description: Experience unparalleled luxury at The Mercer, a tranquil oasis in the bustling heart of Manhattan. Indulge in rejuvenating spa treatments and savor exquisite Italian dishes at Sartiano's, complete with alfresco dining and 24-hour room service. Each of the seven opulent guestrooms features plush pillowtop beds and kitchenettes, ensuring your comfort while you enjoy complimentary high-speed Wi-Fi and flat-screen entertainment.
hotels.highlight: The Mercer offers pet sitting services alongside luxurious spa treatments and exquisite Italian dining options.

hotels.name: Trump International Hotel & Tower New York
hotels.description: Discover unparalleled luxury at Trump International Hotel & Tower New York, where elegance and convenience come together in the city's vibrant core. Enjoy rejuvenating treatments at the serene spa, savor gourmet meals at the acclaimed Jean-Georges restaurant, and relax in one of the 176 elegantly appointed guestrooms equipped with modern amenities. Book your stay today and experience the true essence of New York luxury.
hotels.highlight: Features a full spa and pet bowls, ensuring both relaxation and comfort for you and your furry friend.

hotels.name: Park Hyatt New York
hotels.description: Experience a luxurious stay at Park Hyatt New York, where you can unwind in the indoor pool and indulge in delectable cuisine at the on-site restaurant. Stay active in the state-of-the-art fitness center and take advantage of convenient services like luggage storage and dry cleaning. With iconic attractions such as Carnegie Hall, the Museum of Modern Art, and Central Park just a short walk away, your urban getaway promises unforgettable moments.
hotels.highlight: Features a hot tub and massage services, allowing pet owners to relax while enjoying nearby cultural attractions.

hotels.name: The Peninsula New York
hotels.description: Experience a luxurious retreat in the heart of Manhattan, featuring a rooftop terrace that offers breathtaking views and a serene spa with an indoor pool. Each elegant room is equipped with modern amenities, including complimentary WiFi, flat-screen TVs, and marble bathrooms with built-in TVs. Savor gourmet dining at Clement restaurant and enjoy signature cocktails at the stylish Salon de Ning rooftop bar for a truly unforgettable stay.
hotels.highlight: The Peninsula New York offers a serene spa, heated indoor pool, and a rooftop terrace with stunning views.
